resources.string: How to play with a friend
Created by Daniele Calisti and Di Berardino Simone
Playing with a friend is so easy! Create your own lobby and wait until your friend joins your match using your code or vice-versa!
Session closed! Create a new lobby to start playing again.
If you register or login to your social account you\'ll grant the access to the multiplayer mode and you\'ll be able to play with your friends at any time!
This room does not exist or your opponent is currently inactive.
Choose your favorite type of cards
This game has been developed by Simone Di Berardino and Daniele Calisti. If you want to get in touch with us, you can send an email to diberardinocalisti@gmail.com!
Waiting for the host, retry in a few seconds…
Are you sure you want to reset your match history?
Do you like this game? Rate the app!
Login with Facebook if you want to edit your profile!
Are you sure you want to logout?
Your username needs to be atleast {length} characters long.
Your password needs to be atleast {length} characters long.
Something went wrong with your account, you will be disconnected.
You entered invalid characters, please retry.
You must be logged with Facebook if you want to show your friends. Confirm if you want to go to your Facebook login page. Note: if you\'re registered with your username, you will be disconnected.
This room is no longer available.
This app needs the access to the internet in order to work, the app will be closed.
Register or login with an email to earn coin and buy some new cool features!
Coins can be used to buy some premium features, watch some ads, beat your opponents or go to the store to earn some!
Your item has been bought correctly
Watching a short ad will grant you {coins} coins which you can use to buy some cool avatars. Do you want to proceed?
No ads ready yet, please retry in a few seconds…
You need {coins} more coins in order to buy this item!
Are you sure you want to buy this item?
Visit the shop to unlock this item!
Page is loading, please be patient!
Register or login with an email to unlock this feature!
